Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class ServerStateListener.StateEvent

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing interface:
    ServerStateListener
    public static class ServerStateListener.StateEvent
extends State.ChangeEvent<BleServerState>
    Subclass that adds the server(), macAddress(), and gattStatus() fields.

    • Method Detail

      • server

        public final BleServer server()
        The server undergoing the state change.

      • macAddress

        public final java.lang.String macAddress()
        Returns the mac address of the client that's undergoing the state change with this server().

      • gattStatus

        public final int gattStatus()
        The change in gattStatus that may have precipitated the state change, or BleStatuses.GATT_STATUS_NOT_APPLICABLE. For example if State.ChangeEvent.didEnter(State) with BleServerState.DISCONNECTED is true and State.ChangeEvent.didExit(State) with BleServerState.CONNECTING is also true then gattStatus() may be greater than zero and give some further hint as to why the connection failed.

      • toString

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
